citation_details.title: Dynamics of visual object coding within and across the hemispheres: Objects in the periphery
citation_details.author: AK Robinson, T Grootswagers, SM Shatek
citation_details.abstract: The human brain continuously integrates information across its two hemispheres to construct  a coherent representation of the perceptual world. Characterising how visual information is
